titles: A Christmas bankette garnyshed with many pleasaunt and deynty disshes, newely prepared by Theodore Basille
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publisher: In Botulphe lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by me Iohn̄ Mayler for Iohn̄ Gough,
notes: In this edition, p. E1r has catchword: thinges.
reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
